description: The journeys of the characters at the Rose Harbor Inn come to a close in this last book of the series.
title: SWEET TOMORROWS
author: Debbie Macomber

description: When bodies are found at a Hamptons estate where a series of grisly murders once occurred, a local detective and former New York City cop investigates.
title: THE MURDER HOUSE
author: James Patterson and David Ellis

description: Lt. Eve Dallas of the N.Y.P.D. is on the case when three skaters are shot by a sniper. By Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.
title: APPRENTICE IN DEATH
author: J D Robb

description: From stray mutt to golden-haired puppy, a dog finds himself reincarnated over the years as he searches for his purpose in life.
title: A DOG'S PURPOSE
author: W Bruce Cameron

description: Ben Sterling returns home to Mystic Creek to settle down and start a family, but the woman of his interest is more than a little resistant. As she warms to him, her past comes back to interfere.
title: MULBERRY MOON
author: Catherine Anderson

description: The Sisterhood steps up when the legal client of a member is threatened by  ruthless politics and ambition in Washington.
title: CRASH AND BURN
author: Fern Michaels

description: The psychologist Alex Delaware and the L.A.P.D. Lt. Milo Sturgis search for the missing son of a troubled actress.
title: BREAKDOWN
author: Jonathan Kellerman

description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals. The basis for the movie.
title: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN
author: Paula Hawkins

description: The covert operative Cotton Malone must thwart an agent loyal to the former Soviet Union.
title: THE 14TH COLONY
author: Steve Berry

description: Ren Colter, a wealthy rancher, protects a beautiful woman from a stalker.
title: WYOMING BRAVE
author: Diana Palmer

description: Two New Yorkers reconstruct the history of a young woman and a love affair at the time of World War II.
title: PROPERTY OF A NOBLEWOMAN
author: Danielle Steel

description: In the 11th Ali Reynolds novel, Ali and her husband work to clear her fatherâ€™s name when he is accused of murdering the financial adviser who steered him wrong.
title: CLAWBACK
author: J A Jance

description: When a member of an elite paramilitary squad is ambushed and almost killed, he is ordered to stay under the radar in a small town until the unknown enemy is identified.
title: TROUBLEMAKER
author: Linda Howard

description: Stephanie Plum pursues a fraternity member arrested for beating up a college dean and investigates a murder.
title: TRICKY TWENTY-TWO
author: Janet Evanovich
